body: PAIN. I'm not ready for this in the remake
The sad part is this is canon.

Don’t listen to the other guys. 
It’s beautiful.

Not to mention the age of this, it's nearly a decade old but I really loved how the author portrayed the characters 心.
He clearly gets it and for this reason I couldn't resist translating it.

I dont know why the wankers decided to reprint this but rhey clearly dont care about submission quality. I'm the one who did this scan. The context is tsukihime's Kohaku and shiki and SHIKI setting. It's better off if you dont consider this as a porn medium, but rather that of a story-focused doujin. It's misleading because most of the doujinshi here are for faps not feels.
But if you haven't read the nasu work, you wont get it. Context is very very important.
"Kohaku isn't a doll, despite her tragic past, she still retains a sliver of human-like traits, and she longs for not Shiki Makihisa but rather Shiki Tohno"
What the fuck is that shit
